name: BREAKING BAD: THE GAME
description:
"The interactive flash-based Breaking Bad experience has been lost media for ten years...... but now YOU can see for yourself why nobody played it."
-Xploshi
After a copy of the flash version was found hosted on a naughty naughty sight, One lone Indie Developer took it upon himself to port this mythical jem into a windows executable.

Based on (and pretty much stolen) from "BREAKING BAD: THE GAME" by Xploshi
https://youtu.be/foOaLzx2qSc
(If you would like this taken down, Please email me at mpewills@gmail.com)
Programming - Me

Recreation of assets - 645 (https://gamejolt.com/@642)

Original Ideas - Xploshi (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5ZYmN3WCpRv3WGUB6PXCkw)
